thread.title: Catholic Church 'appalled' at changes to Easter trading
thread.title_full: Catholic Church 'appalled' at changes to Easter trading

title: Catholic Church 'appalled' at changes to Easter trading
text:
Topix › Pacific Travel › Catholic Church 'appalled' at changes... Catholic Church 'appalled' at changes to Easter trading Next Story Prev Story 9 hrs ago Read more: Stuff.co.nz 
Currently, public holidays are observed on Good Friday and Easter Monday, and Sunday is a restricted trading day. Some tourist towns, such as Queenstown and Taupo, are exempt from the heavy restrictions on trading. Start the conversation, or Read more at Stuff.co.nz.
